title: Why is urf unavailable???
body:
Its supposed to be available all weekend until today (monday) at 3pm 

So now i have probably missed the only window i would get to play it today because it wasn't there at the only time i could play it....

that really sucks... like ffs :/

So why isn't it there?

replies.body: It's 3am, not 3pm.... looks like you missed it.

You literally posted the picture saying 3 AM and you still put 3 PM???!?!?!?!?
Eyeballs.

had it in my mind it was 3pm also, was a sad way to wake up. 

They need to make URF a custom map option type
